question:
In light of the recent constitution of the Pronab Sen committee, consider the following statements:
  1. It was set up by the finance ministry.
  2. It is to review the definition of index of industrial production.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Pronab Sen committee was set up by the ministry of statistics and program implementation (MOSPI). It is composed of 28 members and headed by chief statistician Pronab Sen. It is a standing committee on economic statistics and will subsume 4 standing committees: on labour force statistics (SCLFS), on industrial statistics (SCIS), on service sector (SCSS) and on service sector and unincorporated sector enterprises (SCSSUSE). Statement 2 is correct: The Pronab Sen committee was constituted to review the definition of IIP or index of industrial production among others. The IIP gives the growth rate observed in a given period in a given industrial group. The committee is also to look into data sources, time use survey, periodic labour force survey, unorganised sector statistics and economic census.
